content:
Oh wow. Atbilde jau ir.

Your organization's request for sponsored hosting has been approved! You have been upgraded to Zulip Cloud Standard, free of charge.
Rihards Olups has marked this topic as resolved.
Un tagad nevajadzēs paļauties uz custom ziņu publiskošanas risinājumu. Varam pēc tam izdomāt, vai to vēlamies atstāt.
Galvenais, lai plāns nebeidzas pēkšņi. Var laikam atstāt kā rezervi
